context.p: When you're done with processing your photo, you can exportexport your photo to another file. retains your original file and writes the processed photo into a new file.

supports the following formats among other formats.
PDFPDF
TIFFTIFF
PNGPNG
The default format is , but you can set other formats in the view under format options on the right pane of the view.
Exporting consists of a single step.

step.stepresult: During the exportexport procedure, you see the path of your exportexport file on the screen.
